attributes.action: Allow other suppliers to connect broadband services as Openreach service is poor
attributes.background: New builds and new connection are taking to long to complete with engineers not turning up for appointment costing people money. Or unable to actually get any information regarding a connection or when you will be connected.if they cant cope with demand allow other isp access to connect hardware

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition as this isn't something that the Government or Parliament could do. This would be a decision for the Competition and Markets Authority, which is independent of both the UK Government and Parliament. You can find out more about the Competition and Markets Authority here:

https://www.gov.uk/government/organisations/competition-and-markets-authority/about
